631.question: Why did they think this was a good idea?
631.response: {'Answer': 'The symptoms are aversion to cold, fever, headache, nasal obstruction, not thirsty, floating and weak pulse, so the prescription should be: Radix Ephedrae, Ramulus Cinnamomi, Radix Glycyrrhizae Preparata, Fructus Armeniacae Amarum, Radix Angelicae Sinensis, Radix Paeoniae Alba, Rhizoma Atractylodis Macrocephalae, Poria, Radix Bupleuri, Radix Scutellariae, Herba Menthae.'}
631.answer: They think it will help human TCM practitioners make prescriptions.
